definition: to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: Reductions in staffing at the major banks.
sentences.chinese: 在裁減人員時的主要銀行。

sentences.english: The next spring the seeds should be knocked out of their seed-heads and planted.
sentences.chinese: 來年的春天的種子應被裁減，他們的穀穗和種植的。

sentences.english: Adecco itself said last week it would cut 600 jobs in France.
sentences.chinese: Adecco上週表示，將在法國裁減600個崗位。

sentences.english: They have already run down their inventories and are trimming investment and jobs.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經開始降低庫存，減少投資，裁減崗位。

sentences.english: His tailoring work will only focus on the method content package.
sentences.chinese: 他的裁減工作只需集中在方法內容包。

sentences.english: Conditions and procedures for lay offing employees.
sentences.chinese: 裁減人員的條件和程序。

sentences.english: He saw cutting public spending as another priority.
sentences.chinese: 他將裁減公共開支看爲另一項重中之重。

sentences.english: If Party A intends to reduce personnel according to law, the Contract could be terminated;
sentences.chinese: 甲方依法裁減人員的，可以解除本合同。

sentences.english: He is assiduously shedding civil servants and wants to fix the procurement process to avoid exorbitant cost overruns.
sentences.chinese: 他努力裁減公務人員並要在軍事採購中避免非法超支。

sentences.english: Rather, you need to right-size the process to project needs.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，你需要根據項目需要正確裁減過程的大小。

sentences.english: Boehner's proposal would also create a bipartisan committee and have lawmakers vote on a constitutional amendment for balanced budgets.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，兩黨小組委員會建議進一步裁減。

sentences.english: To reduce unnecessary officials is a focal point of government work this year.
sentences.chinese: 裁減冗官是政府今年的工作重點之一。

sentences.english: Total disarmament was stipulated in the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 全部裁減軍備條款是和平協議的必要條件。
裁減政府部門中的冗員。

sentences.english: There are several options available for building your own versions of Ext into minified output files.
sentences.chinese: 有幾種方案可制定的Ext，製成裁減過的版本輸出。

sentences.english: Thellos season, the Second Group Phase has been abolished in favor of a two-legged knockout round.
sentences.chinese: 本賽季，原先的第二階段小組賽改成兩回合的裁減賽。

definition: to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
